Nuclear, but nevermind-I got my answers. On another board, we were talking =
about the radiation at Chernobyl. Destination Truth filmed an episode there=
.

I was referred to a person who had actually been there. The radiation th=
at still remains round most of the area has no effect on most electronic eq=
uipment, as it is usually properly shielded.


  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: phenom_investigator

day, October 04, 2009 8:49 AM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: A Question on Radiat=
ion

terested in?

  >

icularly if it can cause electronic equipment to malfunction?
  >

ks!
